publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3528.2 Robin Harper: Marine Bill Consultationâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-3528) in the name of Richard Lochhead, leave out from "to drive" to "proposals" and insert "to accommodate environmentally sustainable economic development and improve the stewardship of the marine environment; acknowledges the positive response to the consultation, Sustainable Seas for All, the widespread support for the proposals and the concerns that remain". Supported by: Patrick Harvie*
